      • ILP

           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> gridPoints,
           double[][] t_ij,
           java.lang.String log,
           int mnopg,
           java.lang.String resultFilename)
    throws gurobi.GRBException
        constructor
        Parameters:
        nDrones - number of drones
        startPoint - base station
        gridPoints - list of grid points without base station
        t_ij - euclidean distances from grid point i to grid point j
        log - filename to log
        mnopg - maximum number of grid points each drone is allowed to visit
        Throws:
        gurobi.GRBException

        private void addInOutConstraint(Func<java.lang.Integer,gurobi.GRBVar> f,
                                java.lang.String direction)
                         throws gurobi.GRBException
        add the constraint that each grid point has exactly one ingoing and one outgoing edge
        Parameters:
        f - the function which returns either the ingoing or the outgoing edge
        direction - name of the constraint - ingoing or outgoing
        Throws:
